welcome_message_body: Welcome to Erdemli, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: Esenpinar Tantuni
restaurants.description: Esenpinar Tantuni is a fast food restaurant located in the city.
